# 2016 Origins Award winners

The following are the winners of the 43rd annual (2016) Origins Award, presented at Origins 2017:
{| class="wikitable"
! Category
! Winner
! Company
! Designer(s)
|-
| Game of the Year
| Scythe
| Stonemaier Games

| Stonemaier Games

| North Star Games

| Warhammer 40,000 Kill Team

| Pokémon XY - Steam Siege
| The Pokémon Company
|
|-
|Best Role-Playing  Game
| No Thank You, Evil!
| Monte Cook Games
|
|-
|Best Game Accessory
| Blood Rage Organizer
| The Broken Token
|
|-
|}
